Sentencas: In order to develop interconnect ceramics for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs), perovskite compounds, Gd1-xCaxCrO3 (x=0 similar to 0.3), were prepared by an auto-ignition process and characterized.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical conductivity of perovskite Gd1-xCaxCrO3 (0≤x≤0.3) by auto-ignition process

Sentencas: XRD analysis indicated that a single perovskite phase was obtained as Ca2+ content (x value) was lower than 0.3, while a second phase appeared at x=0.4.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical conductivity of perovskite Gd1-xCaxCrO3 (0≤x≤0.3) by auto-ignition process

Sentencas: The lattice parameters of the unit cell decrease with increasing the substitution Ca2+ for Gd3+.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical conductivity of perovskite Gd1-xCaxCrO3 (0≤x≤0.3) by auto-ignition process

Sentencas: The particle sizes of Gd0.7Ca0.3CrO3 powders are in the range of 20 similar to-50 nm observed by TEM.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical conductivity of perovskite Gd1-xCaxCrO3 (0≤x≤0.3) by auto-ignition process

Sentencas: The powders exhibited better sintering ability and could reach 94.8% relative density at 1400 degrees C for 4 h in air.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical conductivity of perovskite Gd1-xCaxCrO3 (0≤x≤0.3) by auto-ignition process

Sentencas: The DC four probe technique measurement indicated that the electrical conductivities of the specimens increased with increasing Ca2+ content as x <= 0.3 but remarkably dropped when x=0.4, which might be attributed to the formation of the second phase with lower conductivity in the materials.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical conductivity of perovskite Gd1-xCaxCrO3 (0≤x≤0.3) by auto-ignition process
Synthesis and electrical conductivity of perovskite Gd1-xCaxCrO3 (0≤x≤0.3) by auto-ignition process

Sentencas: with a density of 94% showed an electrical conductivity of 24 Scm(-1) in air and 7.5 Scm(-1) in H-2 (99.999%) at 700 degrees C respectively, which is about 50% more than that of the commonly used lanthanum chromite (La0.7Ca0.3CrO3).
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical conductivity of perovskite Gd1-xCaxCrO3 (0≤x≤0.3) by auto-ignition process

Sentencas: It will be suitable to be interconnect material for IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical conductivity of perovskite Gd1-xCaxCrO3 (0≤x≤0.3) by auto-ignition process
Synthesis and electrical conductivity of perovskite Gd1-xCaxCrO3 (0≤x≤0.3) by auto-ignition process
